" SUGAR mobile phone customer service commitment:"
If you can not activate by network, repair bills still prevail
Improve user information helps improve maintenance efficiency
Get your location automatically locate your nearest repair service

" Strict according to "consumer protection law", "law of the people's Republic of China product quality law" and "\mobile phone repair replacement merchandise refund liability provisions implementation of customer service" three packs of services, service content is as follows: 
 in three packs of validity period, you can be in accordance with the provisions enjoy maintenance, replacement, return of the rights, repair, a replacement, return should be handled with the invoice and the three guarantees certificate. 
 since you purchase within 7 days, the mobile phone host appeared "\mobile phone product performance fault table" listed in the performance of a fault condition, by SUGAR after sale service center detection determines, according to your choice, free for return, replacement or repair. 
 since you purchase within 8 days to 30 days, the mobile phone host appeared "\mobile phone product performance fault table" listed in the performance of the fault situation, determined via the SUGAR customer service service center detection, on the basis of your choice, free of charge for replacement or repair. 
 since you purchase within 12 months as of the date, the mobile phone host appeared "\mobile phone product performance fault form" listed in the performance of fault conditions, determined via SUGAR after-sales service center detection, according to your choice, free repair. 
 battery, charger, earphone, data line external cable mobile telephone accessories, appear "mobile telephone product performance fault form" listed in the performance of the fault, determine via SUGAR after-sales service center detection, the attachment for your free replacement of the same brand of the same model with the specifications, the replacement of two still can not normal use. Free of charge for your return. (sealed) batteries, charger, data line, the warranty period shall be 1 years, external wired headset (except the third party brand earphone) warranty period of 6 months. "
Electronic warranty card requires networking activation, the activation will enjoy paperless warranty service, whether to open network

" Electronic warranty card is one of the mobile phone warranty information registration method. \n To buy Electronic warranty cards feature phone users, in addition to fill and registration paper warranty card, also need to register the electronic card, registration does not charge any fees only user, users will be mobile phone network can be. Through the electronic card, the user information can be quickly and accurately is sent to the manufacturers of the sales and after-sale system, so that you can enjoy more convenient services. Each phone has a serial number (IMEI), serial number registered is not mobile phone number, so the change number to also have no relation.\n registration process: open [center] user client, click on the \"electronic card\" click on the page \"activation\" button\."
Activate e-policy, enjoy free paper of warranty service
